welcome_flow.name: Welcome Flow
welcome_flow.purpose: Introduce new users to the AI Operating System

steps.agent_message: 🚀 Welcome to the AI Operating System Framework! I'm here to help you navigate our intelligent agent ecosystem.
follow_up_prompts: What would you like to explore first?

steps.agent_message: Great choice! Our system includes specialized agents for security, compliance, cost optimization, and more. Each agent works autonomously to improve your system.
follow_up_prompts: Would you like to start with a full system scan?

steps.agent_message: Perfect! I'll run a comprehensive analysis using all our agents. This will give you insights into security, compliance, costs, and system health.
follow_up_prompts: Ready to begin? The analysis will take a few minutes.

help_flow.name: Help Flow
help_flow.purpose: Provide assistance and guidance to users

steps.agent_message: 🆘 I'm here to help! What do you need assistance with?
follow_up_prompts: Let me know what's challenging you right now.

steps.agent_message: I understand you need help with [TOPIC]. Let me provide you with detailed guidance.
follow_up_prompts: Would you prefer a detailed walkthrough or a quick summary?

steps.agent_message: ⚠️ I noticed something went wrong. Don't worry, I'll help you resolve this issue.
follow_up_prompts: Can you tell me what you were trying to do when this happened?

steps.agent_message: Based on the error, here's what likely happened and how to fix it: [ERROR_EXPLANATION]
follow_up_prompts: Would you like me to walk you through the solution?

steps.agent_message: 📝 Your feedback helps us improve! How was your experience with the AI Operating System?
follow_up_prompts: What specific aspect would you like to comment on?

steps.agent_message: Thank you for the feedback! Is there anything specific you'd like to see improved or added?
follow_up_prompts: Your suggestions help shape our roadmap.

design_principles.clarity: Use clear, jargon-free language appropriate for the user's expertise level
design_principles.personality: Maintain a consistent, helpful personality across all interactions
design_principles.context_awareness: Remember previous interactions and user preferences
design_principles.progressive_disclosure: Reveal information gradually based on user needs
design_principles.error_recovery: Provide clear guidance when things go wrong
design_principles.user_agency: Give users control over the conversation flow
design_principles.accessibility: Design for users with varying abilities and technical expertise
design_principles.efficiency: Respect user time with concise, relevant responses
